title: Mexican Forces Kill ‘El Mencho,’ Nation’s Most-Wanted Cartel Boss
summary_full: “El Mencho” was the longtime head of one of the nation’s most powerful cartels. Armed groups set fire to cars and buildings across Mexico in the wake of his death.
summary_public: “El Mencho” was the longtime head of one of the nation’s most powerful cartels. Armed groups set fire to cars and buildings across Mexico in the wake of his death.
